 ¾ Proteinuria +2 or more.
 ∙ If the woman has convulsions, offer supportive care. The initial management of convulsions includes the 
following:
 ¾ Ensure that the airway is clear and she is breathing well.
 ¾ If the woman is unconscious, position her on her left lateral side to reduce the risk of aspiration (vomitus 
and blood).
 ¾ Clean the mouth and nostrils by applying gentle suction and remove the secretions.
 ¾ Remove any visible obstruction or foreign
